name: I Didn't Sign Up for This!
name_original: I Didn't Sign Up for This!
description:
Story
You are an exterminator sent to do a job you know nothing about. Next thing you know you are in a constantly changing room surrounded by monsters of all different types with no way out!

Play your way through 7 stages to reach and attempt to defeat the final boss.

No spoilers about what it is though ;)

Controls
Controls are WASD to move and left click to attack towards mouse.

X-Box controllers do work with this game, Left stick to move, right stick to aim, and right bumper to attack.
